doc:
Thomas G. Waites https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_G._Waites 0 Thomas G. Waites (born January 8, 1955) is an American actor and acting instructor born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Waites runs an acting studio in New York City which is named for him. He has been a member of the Actors Studio since 1984. Thomas_G._Waites ( born January_8_,_1955 ) is an_American_actor and acting instructor born in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania . Waites runs an_acting_studio in New_York_City which is_named for him . He has_been a_member of the_Actors_Studio since 1984 .
